__e: I love every name. And the hearts and blood...
But wherever Adam is and whatever he might be thinking of us, please assure him that he and Joey are close to our hearts and always in our thoughts.
With it, some can stir the soul with music. Others can read the truth in men's hearts and forgive.
They live in the hearts of all who treasure them and will forever.
Lord, I know you sees into the hearts of all men just like you sees into the heart of old Jim Lewis.
It broke our hearts to know that as Robert and I lay in bed that night, our daughter was being murdered.
Because our hearts are, some say, as cold as the water.
I know that tonight is not your night... but I assure you that our hearts are still with you.
